pages.text: fema kane cevabe kavmihi illa en kalu ahricu ale lutim min karyetikum. innehum unasuy yetetahherun
kuli-lhamdu lillahi veselamun `ala `ibadihi-llezine-stafa. ellahu hayrun emma yusrikun
emmen haleka-ssemavati vel'arda veenzele lekum mine-ssemai maa. feembetna bihi hadaika zate behceh. ma kane lekum en tumbitu seceraha. eilahum me`a-llah. bel hum kavmuy ya`dilun
emmen ce`ale-l'arda kararav vece`ale hilaleha enharav vece`ale leha ravasiye vece`ale beyne-lbahrayni haciza. eilahum me`a-llah. bel ekseruhum la ya`lemun
emmey yucibu-lmudtarra iza de`ahu veyeksifu-ssue veyec`alukum hulefae-l'ard. eilahum me`a-llah. kalilem ma tezekkerun
emmey yehdikum fi zulumati-lberri velbahri vemey yursilu-rriyaha busram beyne yedey rahmetih. eilahum me`a-llah. te`ale-llahu `amma yusrikun
